notes: Water Sources in Northern Uganda - based on GPS coordinates of water points (approx >80%) collected (in 2009, 2010, and 2011) by UNOCHA from different stake-holders working in Northern part of Uganda, such as WASH cluster leads, humanitarian partners, and local government. The location of the water points are re-verified by District Water Office (local government) before analysing and publishing Water Coverage and its Accessibility level against national standard.
